author: Muhammad Zulhusni
description:
The fast growth of AI tools in software development, including systems such as Copilot, is helping teams work faster and improve code quality, but companies say the technology can also introduce uneven coding standards, unclear oversight and new access risks. Updates from GitHub, announced at the GitHub Universe event, highlight a shift in how software […]

The post GitHub adds stronger governance for AI agents in Copilot appeared first on Developer Tech News.
title: GitHub adds stronger governance for AI agents in Copilot
